sprite.name: Spike Trap
sprite.notes:
A spike that comes out from the ground to damage every player who would adventure too far.
The position of this preview is when the trap is activated.

value.title: Rotation
value.comment: This determines which angle the spike trap will have.

list.title: Rotation Preset
list.comment: This determines which angle the spike trap will have.

value.title: Group ID
value.comment: This pairs the spike trap to a matching Group Controller for spawn synchronization with other Group controlled sprites.

list.comment: Which event should trigger the trap.

value.title: Time Offset
value.comment:
When triggered, how much time should it wait before activating.
